channel.title: [PI] Drops
channel.description:
Hey guys, I recently got my server up and going, and then some of my players are complaining that nothing drops... I looked into the problem and well NOTHING drops, Everything in NpcConstant.cfg drops, but Common and Rare drops do not :\ its really weird I have looked into npchandler. npcdrops, all the cfg files and cant seem to find the fix for it :\ If any one know anything on the subject please let me know!
thanks!

item.description:
@reality0scape wrote:

DaMatt17:

no.

Does npcdrops.tsm load in npcdrops.java?

Read full topic
